Name: Lionel Messi
Details:
Lionel Messi won the FIFA Ballon d'Or and FIFA World Player of the Year multiple times. 
    He is known for his incredible dribbling skills and goal-scoring ability.

Name: Robert Lewandowski
Details:
Robert Lewandowski won the FIFA Best Men's Player in 2020 and 2021. 
    He is known for his prolific goal-scoring and leadership on the field.

Name: Luka Modrić
Details:
Luka Modrić won the FIFA Best Men's Player in 2018. 
    He is celebrated for his exceptional vision, passing, and midfield control.

Name: Cristiano Ronaldo
Details:
Cristiano Ronaldo won the FIFA Ballon d'Or and FIFA World Player of the Year multiple times.
    He is known for his incredible athleticism and goal-scoring records.

Name: Kaka
Details:
Kaka won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2007. 
    He is known for his elegance on the ball and playmaking abilities.

Name: Fabio Cannavaro
Details:
Fabio Cannavaro won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2006. 
    He is recognized for his defensive prowess and leadership as a center-back.

Name: Ronaldinho
Details:
Ronaldinho won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2004 and 2005. 
    He is famous for his creativity, dribbling, and flair on the pitch.

Name: Ronaldo
Details:
Ronaldo won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2002. 
    He is known for his explosive pace, dribbling, and finishing skills.

Name: Luís Figo
Details:
Luís Figo won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2001. 
    He is celebrated for his dribbling, crossing, and playmaking abilities.

Name: Zinedine Zidane
Details:
Zinedine Zidane won the FIFA World Player of the Year in 2000 and 2003. 
    He is renowned for his skill, vision, and elegance on the ball.
